title: Rockaankuthu Song Lyrics Premam
stanzas:
Paattonnu paada porenda
aadaama irukka mudiyaadhu da
oorellaam visilu parakkudhada
idhu kuththaattam
rockkaatam nee kelu da (2)

rockkuna anga weightu da
kuththuna inga geththu da
rendume kalandhaa
maasu da
say dorey me fa
solate do

rockku kuththu serndhu
vandhaa rockkaan kuthu
idhuthaan daa (2)

ulakora kuthunaa
rockku daa
namma ooru rockkuna
kuththu da

naayar kada chaayaa
nee kudichi paaru paiyaa
ye vella aara soda
adhu peru coacacola

hey thousand watts bulbu
adhu eriya theva power-u
ada kuraiku paar dogu
ada namaku mela godu

aetrikku poti vendaandaa
ellaame onnu isaithaandaa
nan sollum karuthum
idhuthaan daa
say sare gama padha nesa

rockku kuththu serndhu
vandhaa rockkaan kuthu
idhuthaan daa (2)

hey mass kuthu
hey weight kuthu
hey rendaa kuthu
idhu rockkaankuthe

seo.title: Rockaankuthu Song Lyrics Premam
seo.description: Get the complete Rockaankuthu Song Lyrics Premam from Premam. Read the lyrics penned by Pradeep Paalar and composed by Rajesh Murugesan and sung by Anirudh. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pradeep Paalar, Premam, Rajesh Murugesan, Anirudh, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
